decks.name: từ vựng văn phòng
decks.description: list 20 từ vựng văn phòng phổ biến nhất

decks.name: từ vựng công nghệ thông tin
decks.description: list 20 từ vựng CNTT phổ biến nhất

cards.name: office
cards.hint: room where people work
example: Did you go to the office last Friday?
Our office is located downtown.

cards.name: employee
cards.hint: person who works for a company
example: She is a dedicated employee.
The company has 500 employees.

cards.name: employer
cards.definition: chủ lao động, người tuyển dụng
cards.hint: person or company that hires workers
example: My employer offers good benefits.
The employer is looking for new staff.

cards.name: interview
cards.hint: formal meeting to assess someone for a job
example: I have an interview tomorrow.
They will interview three candidates.

cards.name: absent
cards.hint: not present or attending
example: He was absent from the meeting.
Please mark her as absent today.

cards.name: copyright
cards.hint: legal right to control use of creative work
example: This document is protected by copyright.
We need to respect copyright laws.

cards.name: inflation
cards.hint: general increase in prices over time
example: Inflation affects our budget planning.
The inflation rate is 3% this year.

cards.name: draft
cards.hint: preliminary version of a document
example: Please review this draft report.
I need to draft a proposal.

cards.name: meeting
cards.hint: gathering of people to discuss business
example: We have a meeting at 2 PM.
The meeting was very productive.

cards.name: executive
cards.hint: senior manager in a company
example: The executive made the final decision.
She works in executive management.

cards.name: recruiter
cards.hint: person who finds and hires new employees
example: The recruiter called me yesterday.
Our recruiter specializes in IT positions.

cards.name: mailbox
cards.hint: container for receiving mail or emails
example: Check your mailbox for new messages.
The mailbox is full of documents.

cards.name: onboard
cards.hint: process of integrating new employees
example: We need to onboard the new staff.
The onboarding process takes one week.

cards.name: product
cards.hint: item made or sold by a company
example: Our new product launches next month.
This product has great reviews.

cards.name: manager
cards.hint: person who supervises other employees
example: My manager approved my vacation.
She became a manager last year.

cards.name: pay slip
cards.hint: document showing salary details
example: I need my pay slip for the bank.
The pay slip shows all deductions.

cards.name: skill
cards.hint: ability to do something well
example: Communication is an important skill.
He has excellent technical skills.

cards.name: estimate
cards.hint: approximate calculation or judgment
example: Can you give me a cost estimate?
I estimate it will take two hours.

cards.name: contract
cards.hint: legal agreement between parties
example: Please sign the contract.
The contract expires next year.

cards.name: internship
cards.hint: temporary work experience for students
example: She got an internship at Google.
The internship lasts three months.

cards.name: software
cards.hint: computer programs and applications
example: We need to update the software.
This software is very user-friendly.

cards.name: hardware
cards.hint: physical components of a computer
example: The hardware needs to be replaced.
Our hardware is getting outdated.

cards.name: database
cards.hint: organized collection of data
example: The database stores customer information.
We need to backup the database.

cards.name: network
cards.hint: connected system of computers
example: The network is running slowly.
Configure the network settings.

cards.name: server
cards.hint: computer that provides services to other computers
example: The server is down for maintenance.
We host our website on this server.

cards.name: algorithm
cards.hint: step-by-step procedure for calculations
example: This algorithm sorts data efficiently.
The search algorithm is very fast.

cards.name: cloud
cards.hint: computing services delivered over the internet
example: Our data is stored in the cloud.
Cloud computing reduces costs.

cards.name: cybersecurity
cards.hint: protection of computer systems from threats
example: Cybersecurity is crucial for businesses.
We invest heavily in cybersecurity.

cards.name: artificial intelligence
cards.hint: simulation of human intelligence in machines
example: AI is transforming many industries.
This app uses artificial intelligence.

cards.name: programming
cards.hint: process of creating computer software
example: I'm learning programming.
Programming requires logical thinking.

cards.name: bug
cards.hint: error or flaw in computer software
example: We found a bug in the code.
This bug causes the app to crash.

cards.name: backup
cards.hint: copy of data for protection against loss
example: Always backup your important files.
The backup process runs automatically.

cards.name: update
cards.hint: newer version of software or data
example: Please install the latest update.
We need to update the system.

cards.name: firewall
cards.hint: security system that monitors network traffic
example: The firewall blocked suspicious traffic.
Configure the firewall settings.

cards.name: interface
cards.hint: point where user interacts with computer
example: The user interface is very intuitive.
This API provides a clean interface.

cards.name: encryption
cards.hint: process of encoding information for security
example: All data is protected by encryption.
Use strong encryption for passwords.

cards.name: bandwidth
cards.hint: maximum data transfer rate of a network
example: We need more bandwidth for video calls.
High bandwidth improves performance.

cards.name: debugging
cards.hint: process of finding and fixing software errors
example: Debugging took most of the day.
Use debugging tools to find the issue.

cards.name: repository
cards.hint: storage location for software code
example: Upload your code to the repository.
The Git repository contains all versions.

cards.name: deployment
cards.hint: process of making software available for use
example: The deployment went smoothly.
Schedule the deployment for tonight.
